page.title: 19MY FATHER'S DAY
page.content: My father often wakes up at 6 o'clock in the morning.For breakfast he usually has All Bran,which is little brown sticks of bran.After breakfast he goes off to London to work.London is a famous city in England.He works in an office.He arrives at 7.15a.m.My father is the boss of an engineering company.He does not come home for lunch.He goes to a cafe with his workmates.My father eats chicken salad when he is at the cafe but when he's at home he eats anything that's going. When he goes back to work he starts phoning people up & talking to them.He also writes letters to people & chats over company business.He usually sets off for home at about 8.45p.m. so he does not usually see me in the evening.
